title: Enhancing Complex Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Through Online Teamwork

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and online collaboration tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Cultivating team collaboration skills based on psychological safety in the post-COVID-19 online learning environment. Utilizes real-time collaboration tools in a BYOD setting.

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems while maintaining psychological safety within online teams using a three-stage feedback process.
Learners can collaborate with team members from diverse professional backgrounds to propose three or more problem-solving strategies.
Learners can improve the mathematical validity of team solutions by over 80% through iterative feedback (three or more rounds).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
